title: Full-Stack Web Development
description: End-to-end web application development using modern technologies like React, Next.js, Node.js, and MongoDB. From concept to deployment, I build scalable and performant web applications.
features: Responsive web design for all devices

title: GenAI & LLM Integration
description: Integrate cutting-edge AI capabilities into your applications. From chatbots to content generation, I implement LLM-powered features using Mistral AI, OpenAI, and LangChain.

title: API Development & Integration
description: Design and develop robust RESTful APIs with comprehensive documentation. I also integrate third-party APIs and services into your existing applications.

title: Frontend Development
description: Create stunning, responsive user interfaces with modern frameworks. I focus on performance, accessibility, and user experience to deliver exceptional frontend solutions.

title: Technical Consulting
description: Get expert advice on technology stack selection, architecture design, and best practices. I help you make informed decisions for your project's success.
